typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SETID as string,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE as string,
		LAST_UPD_DATETIME as timestamp,
		MAPPING_COMMENTS as string,
		EFFDT as timestamp,
		EFF_STATUS as string,
		DTTM_STAMP as timestamp,
		OPR_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcSysCodeMap
source(output(
		SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		SRC_DATE as string,
		ACCOUNT_NUMBER as string,
		SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE as string,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_ORIG_CURR as decimal(19,4),
		ORIG_ACCT_AMOUNT_CURR as string,
		BU_CODE as string,
		SOURCE_PROD_CODE as string,
		ACCT_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_CNY as decimal(19,4),
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		TENOR_DAYS as integer,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		CUST_NUMBER as string,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_CODE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_DESCR as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_RATE_TYPE as string,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		ACCT_OUTSTAND_BAL as decimal(19,4),
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		CUST_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		NEXT_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_TERM_MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		CONV_ACCT_AMOUNT as decimal(19,4),
		LAST_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FiAvgBal
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		SETID as string,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR as integer,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD as integer,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RunControlTbl
source(output(
		SETID as string,
		TRANS_POINT_ID as integer,
		TRANS_POINT_DESC as string,
		BRANCH_ID as integer,
		EFFDT as timestamp,
		EFF_STATUS as string,
		DTTM_STAMP as timestamp,
		OPR_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
SrcSysCodeMap select(mapColumn(
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FiAvgBal select(mapColumn(
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID = ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
		ASOF_DT = SRC_DATE,
		CUST_ID = CUST_NUMBER,
		CHANNEL_ID = CUST_RM_CODE,
		TRANSACTION_DT = EFFECTIVE_DATE,
		FI_START_DATE = LAST_REPRICING_DATE,
		FI_START_DATE = NEXT_REPRICING_DATE,
		CURRENCY_CD = ORIG_ACCT_AMOUNT_CURR,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC = ACCT_AMOUNT_ORIG_CURR,
		MATURITY_DATE = TENOR_DAYS,
		RATE_RESET_TYPE = ACCT_RATE_TYPE,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE,
		FI_FLOOR_RATE = BASE_RATE,
		BU_CODE,
		TENOR_MONTHS,
		CLOSED_DATE,
		REPRICING_FREQ,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE,
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE,
		LOAN_INDICATOR,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND,
		BRANCH_ID,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH,
		SRC_SYSTEM_ID,
		SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE,
		SOURCE_PROD_CODE,
		ACCT_RM_CODE,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_CNY,
		MATURITY_DATE,
		OPEN_DATE,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_CODE,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_DESCR,
		ACCT_OUTSTAND_BAL,
		ACCT_CURRENCY_CODE,
		NEXT_ROLLOVER_DATE,
		NEXT_TERM_MATURITY_DATE,
		CONV_ACCT_AMOUNT,
		LAST_ROLLOVER_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
RunControlTbl select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
DerivedColumn1, Select2, Select3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Select1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
